item.description:
Hey Salsa Fans: Let's go check out Mojitos for a fun night of salsa dancing Friday the 19th.  Let's meet outside at 8:30 to get to know each other for a bit before going inside.  I will be wearing a black fedora hat and will be standing near the entrance.

Here are the details:

Salsa Lessons:

Mojitos offers Salsa lessons on Fridays and Saturdays. The lessons are beginner to intermediate level and run from 9:15-10:15. No reservation or partner is required. Every Friday, one of Boston’s most popular instructors, Kelly, leads the lesson. On Saturday, Ulrich from Rumba y Timbal dance company will teach you the steps. The lessons are a great way to brush up on your dance moves or fun way to kick off the night with friends. Mojitos is 21+, $10 per lesson per person.

Mojito's Website

http://mojitosboston.com/

Parking/Directions

http://mojitosboston.com/parking/

See you there !!

-Angel S.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a black fedora hat and will be standing near the entrance.

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Salsa Dancing at Mojitos !!
